Package com.martensigwart.fakeload

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FakeLoad
    Represents the main API for the FakeLoad Library.
    FakeLoadExecutor
    An object that executes submitted FakeLoad objects.
    FakeLoadScheduler
    Object that schedules submitted FakeLoad objects.
    LoadSimulator
    Represents a thread simulating some system load.
    SimulationInfrastructure
    Represents a simulation infrastructure in which system load as specified by FakeLoad objects is simulated.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLoadSimulator
    Skeleton LoadSimulator implementation.
    CpuSimulator
    Skeleton implementation of a CPU Simulator
    DefaultFakeLoadExecutor
    The default FakeLoadExecutor implementation.
    DefaultFakeLoadScheduler
    Default implementation of the FakeLoadScheduler interface.
    DefaultSimulationInfrastructure
    Default implementation class of SimulationInfrastructure.
    DiskInputSimulator
    Skeleton implementation of a LoadSimulator that simulates disk input.
    DiskOutputSimulator
    Skeleton implementation of a LoadSimulator that simulates disk output Disk output is simulated by writing an amount of bytes to a file.
    FakeLoadBuilder
    A FakeLoad builder.
    FakeLoadExecutors
    Factory methods that create FakeLoadExecutor instances.
    FakeLoads
    Factory and utility methods for FakeLoad classes defined in this package.
    FibonacciCpuSimulator
    A CpuSimulator that simulates CPU by calculating Fibonacci sequences.
    LoadController
    This class acts as the controlling entity of the simulation infrastructure.
    MemorySimulator  
    RandomAccessDiskInputSimulator
    A DiskInputSimulator that simulates disk input using an underlying RandomAccessFile.
    RandomAccessDiskOutputSimulator
    A DiskOutputSimulator that simulates disk output using an underlying RandomAccessFile.
    SystemLoad
    Class representing system load.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MemoryUnit
    Enum representing different memory units like bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, gigabytes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MaximumLoadExceededException
    Exception indicating the exceeding of load level.
